name: Power Force VR
description:
# Oculus Quest 1 or 2 is required to run Power Force VR

# This is a game developed by me and some of my colleagues in our leisure time.  We tended to make it bigger, deeper and longer with storyline and more functions. But further development needs support from my boss'.

# So if you think this game (or demo?) is good and you want us to continue this project, leave a review tell us your suggestions and what you think.

Game Intro

Alien forces are invading Earth, must protect our homeland right away.

Come! Grab weapons and eliminate endless enemies till the wormhole closes!

Features of the game：

1. Diverse types of Alien forces and attack modes

2. Trendy weapons and bullet

3. Challenging fight

4. Confront with the mighty boss
